author: leosimons
msg: Fix a bunch of bugs in the new persistence code, and change the log reporter to report on them properly. Also update the 'fixture' metadata with a basic bootstrapped ant package which is used for running the <ant commands. The persistence stuff now seems to work properly on this fixture.

msg: Add support for resetting DynaActionForm property values through configuration.
